source: # Convert sentences into embeddings and Y_Train into one-hot vectors

embeddings_index={}

cnt = 0
for line in f:
    values=line.split()
    word = values[0]
    coefs=np.asarray(values[1:],dtype='float32')
    embeddings_index[word]=coefs
f.close()
# Now we have to convert sentences into vectors.

source:
from keras.models import Sequential
from keras.layers import Dense, Input, Dropout, SimpleRNN,LSTM, Activation
from keras.utils import np_utils

model=Sequential()
model.add(LSTM(64,input_shape=(10,50)))
model.add(Dropout(0.5))
model.add(Dense(5))
model.add(Activation('softmax'))
model.summary()

model1=Sequential()
model1.add(LSTM(64,input_shape=(10,50),return_sequences=True))
model1.add(Dropout(0.5))
model1.add(LSTM(64,return_sequences=False))
model1.add(Dropout(0.5))
model1.add(Dense(5))
model1.add(Activation('softmax'))
model1.summary()
